/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
